ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T20:05:47 [Issue ID 4000-268823] urn:comicvine:4000-268823 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 16:19:50. [Issue ID 817118]
ComicInfo.Summary:
The 'High Fashion Comic Book That's SO Six Months Ago' is now 'The High Fashion Comic Book That's SO Fifty Years Ago.' That's right! 'The 60s Are Back' as Dave Sim again fills in for glamourpuss who is still contesting her indictment on trafficking in narcotics.
The History of Photorealism in Comics section continues with the events of September 6, 1956 as Alex Raymond and Stan Drake head over to Drake's house to pick up his 1956 Corvette.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/glamourpuss-18/4000-268823/
ComicInfo.Title: What if Cerebus Had Lived in the Age of Madmen
